extensionDescription.message: Intensify images with a simple right-click.

menuItemIntensify.description: Title of context menu item that triggers the intensification.

defaultText.description: Default text for the text input.

optionsMagnitudeDescription.message: Shaking intensity (1: subtle, 20: probably too much)

optionsTextToDisplay.message: Text to display on the image

optionsTextPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the text input.

optionsFontSize.description: Subtitle for the font size input.

optionsFontSizeDescription.description: Description of the font size input.

optionsTextEffect.description: Subtitle for the text effect radio inputs.

optionsRadioAlong.message: Shake the text along with the image

optionsRadioShake.message: Shake the text independently from the image

optionsRadioPulse.message: Pulse the text on the image

optionsRadioMove.message: Pulse and move the text with the image

optionsScaleDown.description: Subtitle for the scale down checkbox.

optionsScaleDownDescription.message: Scale the image down (good for larger images)
optionsScaleDownDescription.description: Description of the scale down input.

downloadHelper.message: (click on the image to download it)
downloadHelper.description: The helper text below the intensified gif
